properties.name: application.security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: A key that is used for JWT signing.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.expiration-millis
properties.description: A time before generated JWT key is expired.

properties.name: application.user.email-regexp
properties.description: Regular expression that is used to check users' emails for correctness.

properties.name: application.user.username-regexp
properties.description: Regular expression that is used to check users' usernames for correctness.
